resources.string: Can You Answer these 10 Basic Common Sense Questions?
How good is your common sense? Test it with these 10 tricky questions.
1- A plane crashes on the United States/Canada border. Where are the survivors buried?
2- What’s the difference between the 2 words: “RACECAR” and “RACECAR” ?
3- A farmer has 13 cows. A bolt of lightning kills all but 5 of them. How many cows survived ?(Answer by just entering the number)
4- If there is an Arithmetic expression \"4 Op 5 = x\" and Op is one of the two operators: * and + then what can be the possible values of x?
5- How many times can you take 5 from 25?
6- Some months have 30 days, Some have 31. How many have 28 days?
7- Who makes it has no need for it, who buys it has no use for it. Who uses, can’t see it or feel it. What is it?
umm… a present for someone else!
8- I am my father’s child, mother’s child, yet nobody’s son ….who/what am I?
9)A man is about to be put to death and the judge said the man could choose how his death should be, but he walks out of the room unharmed. What did he choose?
He wanted to drown, but there was no river
Death by Do-do but there\'s no do-dos (Clever ;))
10- Is it legal for a man in California to marry his widow\'s sister?
Yes, as long as she is alive.
Yes, if the man is from California.
You can\'t marry like this in California.
No, the man would be dead.
An image which is based on your score

You are really amazing! You got all the questions right! Unbelievable! Majority of people score below 40%! We know this test is really tough and tricky. But you cracked it all! We really bow down to you! Go challenge anyone in the world, you are the one who is gonna win! You are simply unbeatable!
Our congratulations because you almost answered all 10 questions correctly! You are quite the brain and cannot be confused by tricky questions. You should be really proud of this result you got.

Good! But, May be you gotta take this test again! Wow! Its a really good score. Seriously! Majority of people score below 50%! We know this test is really tough and tricky. You really have a great common sense. But it seems like you weren\'t careful enough while taking it. You dint expect the questions will be so tricky. But they really are. No problem. Try it again and we are sure you\'ll be on top. Click Reset to try again. And this time, keep in mind that the questions may be too tricky.

We know this test is really tough and tricky. Majority of people score below 40%! Its might not be exactly because you don\'t have much common sense. It could be because you took it not so seriously and you weren\'t careful enough while answering. You didn\'t expect the questions will be so tricky. But they really are. Don\'t worry! You could try it again and we are sure you\'ll be on top. Click the Reset to try again. And this time, keep in mind that the questions may be too tricky.
